casebody.data:
HALPERNI, Respondent, v. SCHERMERHORN, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 2, 1893.) Appeal from eleventh district court. Action by William Halperni against Arthur F. Schermerhom.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, with costs to abide the event
